com.bretth.osmosis.core.task.v0_4
Interface RunnableChangeSource

All Superinterfaces:
ChangeSource, java.lang.Runnable, Task
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChangeSinkRunnableChangeSource, MultiChangeSinkRunnableChangeSource, MultiSinkRunnableChangeSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangeBuffer, ChangeDeriver, ChangeMerger, MysqlChangeReader, XmlChangeReader
public interface RunnableChangeSource
extends ChangeSource, java.lang.Runnable

Extends the basic ChangeSource interface with the Runnable capability. Runnable is not applied to the ChangeSource interface because tasks that act as filters do not require Runnable capability.

Author:
Brett Henderson
